headline: Assessing C.H. Robinson (CHRW) Valuation After Its Recent Share Price Surge
summary: C.H. Robinson Worldwide (CHRW) has quietly put together a strong run, with the stock up around 10% over the past month and roughly 24% in the past 3 months, outpacing many logistics peers. See our latest analysis for C.H. Robinson Worldwide. That recent surge sits on top of an already impressive backdrop, with a year to date share price return of nearly 62% and a one year total shareholder return just over 63%. This suggests momentum is still building as investors reassess C.H. Robinson...

headline: Is It Too Late To Consider C.H. Robinson After Its Strong 2025 Share Price Rally?
summary: Wondering if C.H. Robinson Worldwide is still worth buying after such a strong run, or if the easy money has already been made? This breakdown will help you consider whether the current price makes sense. The stock has been on a strong run, climbing 5.6% over the last week and 9.7% over the past month, with returns of 62.0% year to date and 63.6% over the last year that have easily outpaced the broader market. Those gains have come as investors respond to optimism around freight efficiency,...
